sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';
import {
  Box,
  Container,
  Typography,
  Grid,
  Paper,
  List,
  ListItem,
  ListItemIcon,
  ListItemText,
  Divider,
} from '@mui/material';
import {
  School,
  Star,
  Timeline,
  EmojiEvents,
  CheckCircle,
} from '@mui/icons-material';

const About = () => {
  const achievements = [
    'NAAC A+ Grade Accreditation',
    'NBA Accredited Programs',
    'Ranked among Top Engineering Colleges in Tamil Nadu',
    'Excellence in Research and Innovation',
    'Strong Industry Partnerships',
  ];

  const facilities = [
    'State-of-the-art Laboratories',
    'Modern Computer Centers',
    'Well-equipped Library',
    'Smart Classrooms',
    'Sports Complex',
    'Hostel Facilities',
  ];

  return (
    <Box>
      {/* Hero Section */}
      <Box
        className="animated-bg"
        sx={{
          color: 'white',
          py: 8,
          mb: 6,
          position: 'relative',
          overflow: 'hidden',
        }}
      >
        <Container className="hero-animate">
          <Typography variant="h2" gutterBottom align="center" className="gradient-text">
            About SECE
          </Typography>
          <Typography variant="h5" align="center" paragraph className="fade-in" sx={{ color: 'white' }}>
            Empowering Future Engineers with Excellence in Education
          </Typography>
        </Container>
      </Box>

      <Container sx={{ mb: 8 }}>
        {/* Vision & Mission */}
        <Grid container spacing={4} sx={{ mb: 6 }} className="card-grid">
          <Grid item xs={12} md={6}>
            <Paper elevation={3} sx={{ p: 4, height: '100%' }} className="hover-card glass">
              <Box display="flex" alignItems="center" mb={2}>
                <Star color="primary" sx={{ mr: 2, fontSize: 40 }} className="pulse" />
                <Typography variant="h4" className="gradient-text">Vision</Typography>
              </Box>
              <Typography variant="body1" paragraph className="slide-in">
                To be a premier technical institution by providing state-of-the-art infrastructure,
                excellent academic environment and good placement opportunities to produce globally
                competitive engineers.
              </Typography>
            </Paper>
          </Grid>
          <Grid item xs={12} md={6}>
            <Paper elevation={3} sx={{ p: 4, height: '100%' }} className="hover-card glass">
              <Box display="flex" alignItems="center" mb={2}>
                <Timeline color="primary" sx={{ mr: 2, fontSize: 40 }} className="pulse" />
                <Typography variant="h4" className="gradient-text">Mission</Typography>
              </Box>
              <Typography variant="body1" className="slide-in">
                • To impart quality technical education through well-qualified faculty and infrastructure
              </Typography>
              <Typography variant="body1" className="slide-in" sx={{ mt: 1 }}>
                • To enhance industry-institute interaction for practical exposure
              </Typography>
              <Typography variant="body1" className="slide-in" sx={{ mt: 1 }}>
                • To develop leadership qualities and professional ethics
              </Typography>
              <Typography variant="body1" className="slide-in" sx={{ mt: 1 }}>
                • To promote research and entrepreneurial activities
              </Typography>
            </Paper>
          </Grid>
        </Grid>

        {/* Achievements */}
        <Box sx={{ mb: 6 }} className="section-transition">
          <Typography variant="h4" gutterBottom align="center" sx={{ mb: 4 }} className="gradient-text">
            Our Achievements
          </Typography>
          <Grid container spacing={2}>
            {achievements.map((achievement, index) => (
              <Grid item xs={12} sm={6} md={4} key={index} className="stagger-item">
                <Paper
                  elevation={2}
                  sx={{
                    p: 3,
                    height: '100%',
                    display: 'flex',
                    alignItems: 'center',
                  }}
                  className="hover-card glass"
                >
                  <EmojiEvents color="primary" sx={{ mr: 2, fontSize: 30 }} className="floating" />
                  <Typography variant="h6">{achievement}</Typography>
                </Paper>
              </Grid>
            ))}
          </Grid>
        </Box>

        {/* Facilities */}
        <Box className="section-transition">
          <Typography variant="h4" gutterBottom align="center" sx={{ mb: 4 }} className="gradient-text">
            Campus Facilities
          </Typography>
          <Paper elevation={3} sx={{ p: 4 }} className="glass">
            <Grid container spacing={4}>
              <Grid item xs={12} md={6}>
                <List>
                  {facilities.slice(0, Math.ceil(facilities.length / 2)).map((facility, index) => (
                    <React.Fragment key={index}>
                      <ListItem className="stagger-item button-hover">
                        <ListItemIcon>
                          <CheckCircle color="primary" className="pulse" />
                        </ListItemIcon>
                        <ListItemText primary={facility} />
                      </ListItem>
                      {index < Math.ceil(facilities.length / 2) - 1 && <Divider />}
                    </React.Fragment>
                  ))}
                </List>
              </Grid>
              <Grid item xs={12} md={6}>
                <List>
                  {facilities.slice(Math.ceil(facilities.length / 2)).map((facility, index) => (
                    <React.Fragment key={index}>
                      <ListItem className="stagger-item button-hover">
                        <ListItemIcon>
                          <CheckCircle color="primary" className="pulse" />
                        </ListItemIcon>
                        <ListItemText primary={facility} />
                      </ListItem>
                      {index < Math.floor(facilities.length / 2) - 1 && <Divider />}
                    </React.Fragment>
                  ))}
                </List>
              </Grid>
            </Grid>
          </Paper>
        </Box>
      </Container>
    </Box>
  );
};

export default About;
